info.title: HMPPS Core Person Record
info.description:
Overview

This service provides an endpoint to retrieve a person by UUID.

Data provided

The vast majority of the data is sourced from the CPR Record which gets the data from Nomis, Delius & HMCTS source systems.

The data returned for each person record is essentially data that has been retrieved from Nomis, Delius or HMCTS. This includes the following:
  • Identifiers from any of the following source systems : Nomis, Delius & HMCTS
  • Source System itself, so whether it from Nomis, Delius or HMCTS source system.
See the schema definition for the API for full details.

Role restrictions

Role restrictions in this service are applied by a `@PreAuthorize` annotation at either resource or service level. Furthermore, the annotation can be applied at individual method level or class level.

Each endpoint in this API documentation should normally include what restrictions are applied. If there is any doubt then it is worth looking at the GitHub repository here and looking at the endpoint in question.

The following roles are currently in use in this service:
  • ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__RO: Grants access to HMPPS Person API endpoints to retrieve a person record by UUID, CRN, Prison Number or Defendant ID
  • ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__PROBATION_RW: Grants access to create a person record by CRN
  • ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__SYSCON_SYNC_RW: Grants access to update a person record by Prison Number

get.description: Retrieve person record by UUID. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__RO**

Retrieve person record by CRN. Role required is **ROLE_CORE_PERSON_RECORD_API__RO** .
